trans-unit.source: Python module monitoring high-level file system events like Creation, Modification, Move, Copy, and Deletion of files and folders. Lazydog tries to aggregate low-level events between them in order to emit a minimum number of high-level events (actualy one event per user action). Lazydog uses python Watchdog module to detect low-level events.
trans-unit.target: Python模块监控高级文件系统事件,如文件和文件夹的创建、修改、移动、复制和删除。Lazydog试图将低级事件聚合在一起,以便发出最少数量的高级事件(实际是每个用户操作一个事件)。Lazydog使用python看门狗模块来检测低级事件。
用户级文件系统事件观察器
